step1.name: Input Parsing & Simulation Initialization
step1.purpose: Parse the user query, validate inputs, and initialize simulation memory.

subWorkflows.1.1: NLP Preprocessing: Tokenization; Lemmatization; POS tagging; Intent detection.
subWorkflows.1.2: Context Extraction: Extract domain, sector, regulatory, location, and temporal cues.
subWorkflows.1.3: Input Validation: Syntax/grammar checks; Ambiguity detection; Security filtering.
subWorkflows.1.4: Coordinate Seeding: Populate 13-axis vector with initial guesses.
subWorkflows.1.5: Memory Bootstrapping: Load relevant session or persistent context into working memory.

performanceTargets.retryPolicy: Up to 2 retries on transient NLP errors

step2.name: 13-Axis System Mapping & Knowledge Assembly
step2.purpose: Locate the query in 13D coordinate space and build the working subgraph.

subWorkflows.2.2: Knowledge Node Retrieval from vector and graph DBs.
subWorkflows.2.4: Metadata Extraction for regulatory, temporal, and spatial data.

axis1.name: Pillar Level
process: Match query domain keywords to Pillar IDs.
Score and select Pillar and sublevels via embedding similarity.

axis2.name: Sector of Industry
subLevel1: Score candidates and choose classification system.
subLevel2: Filter by semantic overlap with query.

axis3.name: Honeycomb Cross-Domain Links
process: Identify semantically adjacent domains from Axis1+2.
Fetch cross-domain link nodes (e.g., Healthcare ↔ AI).
Rank by co-occurrence and regulatory relevance.

axis4.name: Branch System
process: Load domain taxonomy under selected sector.
Traverse to Branch level matching query subdomain.
Use term‑frequency and embedding similarity for SubBranch.

axis5.name: Node System
process: Identify intersection nodes between branches and other axes.
Score by link strength and co‑occurrence.

axis6.name: Octopus Regulatory Crosswalk
process: Fetch high‑level regulatory frameworks tied to Axis2+4+5.
Identify hub nodes that map multiple regulations.

axis7.name: Spiderweb Compliance Crosswalk
process: Select SpiderNode with highest mesh score.

axis8.name: Knowledge Expert Persona Role
process: Map Axis8 value to expert role.
Fetch role template and skill matrix.

axis9.name: Sector/Industry Expert Persona Role
process: Map Axis9 value to practitioner role.

axis10.name: Octopus Regulatory Expert Persona
process: Map Axis10 value to regulatory authority role.

axis11.name: Spiderweb Compliance Expert Persona
process: Map Axis11 value to compliance officer role.

step3.name: Quad Persona System
step3.purpose: Orchestrate four expert personas for multi‑angle reasoning.

subWorkflows.3.1: Identify personas from axes 8–11 with cosine similarity.

step4.name: Deep Research Agent Activation
step4.purpose: Spawn specialized agents for detailed data gathering.

performanceTargets.retryPolicy: External source timeout → fallback to cached corpus

step5.name: POV Engine Expansion
step5.purpose: Add new expert perspectives for coverage gaps.

step6.name: Multi‑Agent Synthesis & Arbitration
step6.purpose: Structure debates, resolve conflicts, aggregate answers.

step7.name: Deep Neural Analysis & Recursive Learning
step7.purpose: Discover hidden patterns and monitor confidence drift.

step10.name: Recursive AGI Kernel & Self‑Awareness Engine
step10.purpose: Recursive belief realignment and self‑awareness safeguards.

step11.name: Emergence Detection, AGI Guardrails, Containment & Final Output
step11.purpose: Final safety check and answer release or exception handling.

optionalHumanInTheLoop.trigger: Unresolved containment/confidence issues or regulatory mandate.
optionalHumanInTheLoop.handoff: Package trace, metrics, and flagged issues for human review.
optionalHumanInTheLoop.ingestion: Integrate human feedback as high‑authority learning signals.

step12.name: Continuous Self‑Learning Feedback Loop & Knowledge Offload
step12.purpose: Patch memory, offload validated data, seed future runs.

subWorkflows.12.5: Validate facts for redundancy & schema compliance.
subWorkflows.12.6: Offload to validated‑data KB with provenance.
subWorkflows.12.9: Seed future simulations from validated KB.

twelveStepRefinementWorkflow.1: Algorithm of Thought: Task decomposition and structured logic.
twelveStepRefinementWorkflow.2: Tree of Thought: Parallel branch exploration and selection.
twelveStepRefinementWorkflow.3: Gap & Data Analysis: Identify and verify missing information.
twelveStepRefinementWorkflow.4: Deep Reasoning: Extended reflection for analogy formation.
twelveStepRefinementWorkflow.5: Self‑Reflection & Critique: Introspective error and bias checks.
twelveStepRefinementWorkflow.7: Recursive Learning: Update memory with lessons learned.
twelveStepRefinementWorkflow.8: Advanced NLP Parsing: Final semantic and contextual pass.
twelveStepRefinementWorkflow.9: External Validation: Cross‑check against trusted sources.
twelveStepRefinementWorkflow.10: Answer Synthesis & Scoring: Integrate and compute confidence.
twelveStepRefinementWorkflow.11: Output or Escalate: Produce answer or trigger exception workflow.
twelveStepRefinementWorkflow.12: Memory Patch: Persist all new knowledge and trace logs.
